Name: Geofrey
description:
Geofrey is 30 years old. He is married, and blessed with two school-going children.

He is a driver, at the same time he is a farmer. He has been into these businesses for over 10 good years. He normally does his driving business from 8 in the morning to 9 in the night. He earns a profit.

This will be Geofrey's first loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania.

He is applying for this loan to renew his driving permit, and to buy manure, seeds and a water tank for watering.

His dream is to own big lands for farming.

Geofrey promise to be responsible for paying back the loan.
